name: Order Coupon Field for WooCommerce
author: Potent Plugins

sections.description:
This plugin records each coupon code used for an order in an order meta field for reporting purposes. The data recorded reflects coupons added to the order and persists even if the order’s coupons are later modified or deleted.

To report on the fields created by this plugin, check out Product Sales Report Pro (for reporting on product sales totals filtered by coupon code used) or Export Order Items Pro (for exporting individual order items with the order coupon code as a column – use only for orders that have no more than one coupon code).
sections.installation:
1. Click “Plugins” > “Add New” in the WordPress admin menu.
  2. Search for “Order Coupon Field for WooCommerce”.
  3. Click “Install Now”.
  4. Click “Activate Plugin”.

Alternatively, you can manually upload the plugin to your wp-content/plugins directory.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Added option to save the order coupon description in a meta field
  • Update related to WooCommerce 3.0

1.0

  • Initial release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Click “Plugins” > “Add New” in the WordPress admin menu.
  2. Search for “Order Coupon Field for WooCommerce”.
  3. Click “Install Now”.
  4. Click “Activate Plugin”.

Alternatively, you can manually upload the plugin to your wp-content/plugins directory.
